docs.snippet: A detective ruled out a fight between rival fan clubs but did not disclose any other motive for the attack. The police often investigate fan groups for ties to drug traffickers....
docs.lead_paragraph: A detective ruled out a fight between rival fan clubs but did not disclose any other motive for the attack. The police often investigate fan groups for ties to drug traffickers.
docs.abstract: Brazilian police say that armed men killed eight members of soccer fan club Pavilhao 9 in Sao Paulo and that they have ruled out attack as fight between rival fan clubs.

headline.main: Attack on Soccer Fan Club Leaves 8 Dead in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Attack on Soccer Fan Club Leaves 8 Dead in Brazil

docs.snippet: Baltimore police vowed on Monday to make a full and swift probe of the death of a black suspect who suffered spinal injuries after white officers arrested him, the latest incident to raise questions about the treatment of minorities by U.S. police...
docs.lead_paragraph: Baltimore police vowed on Monday to make a full and swift probe of the death of a black suspect who suffered spinal injuries after white officers arrested him, the latest incident to raise questions about the treatment of minorities by U.S. police.

headline.main: Baltimore Police Vow Full Probe of Black Man's Death While in Custody

docs.snippet: An Argentine prosecutor on Monday dismissed allegations that President Cristina Fernandez tried to derail an inquiry into the bombing of a Jewish center in 1994, likely marking the end of the case....

docs.snippet: When he heard angry screams and the hammering of hatchets on the door of his shack last week, Malawian Folias Sakai thought he was about to become the eighth person to be killed in anti-immigrant attacks that have swept South Africa this month....

docs.snippet: Hedy Bohm had just turned 16 when the Nazis packed her and her parents onto a cattle car in May 1944 and sent them from Hungary to the Auschwitz death camp in occupied Poland....
